summary: If you ever played the game "Snake" on your early model Nokia cellphone, then you're familiar with "Nibbler," the original "snake" game. MAN VS SNAKE tells the story of Tim McVey (the gamer... See full summary Â»

title: Man vs Snake: The Long and Twisted Tale of Nibbler
